articles.author: Hayley Halpin
articles.title: EU reaches deal on digital health pass, paving way for summer travel in Europe - thejournal.ie
articles.description: The deal will allow for anybody living in the EU’s 27 countries to secure a digital health pass by the end of June.
articles.content:
THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT and EU member states have reached a deal paving the way for a Covid-19 certificate that will help open up travel in Europe for the key summer season.

articles.title: Scientists in Asia resumed work far quicker than western counterparts, international COVID lockdown - EurekAlert
articles.description: Researchers in China, Japan, and Singapore were able to resume research much quicker than their counterparts in the US and Europe after the first covid lockdowns, results of a new international survey suggest.
